description: This script retrieves the Partner ID from various system sources like syscfg, device properties, and dmcli, and logs related information. It is used to obtain the partner identifier in the system, with fallback mechanisms if primary sources are unavailable.

methods.name: echo_time
methods.description: Logs the current date/time along with the calling context.

methods.name: getPartnerId
methods.description: Retrieves the partner ID from system configuration or device properties, with fallback to default value 'comcast' if not found.

methods.name: getExperience
methods.description: An empty placeholder function, possibly for future implementation.
